rules.title: <title> in rules
rules.abstract: Rule titles name the element, and if necessary, the context for the rules included in the topic. The style guide describes how to use the DITA elements.

rule.rule-statement: When an element occurs in more than one context, use the context in the title.
rule.justification: Using the context allows readers to quickly find the appropriate usage of the element.

rule.rule-statement: Use sentence capitalization when providing context in a title.
